title: Facebook: 2.7 million Europeans data "improperly shared"
text:
Facebook: 2.7 million Europeans data "improperly shared" 3:27pm BST - 01:45 
Facebook has confirmed that the data of 2.7 million EU citizens were among those improperly used by political consultancy Cambridge Analytica, the EU executive said on Friday. Ciara Lee reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Facebook has confirmed that the data of 2.7 million EU citizens were among those improperly used by political consultancy Cambridge Analytica, the EU executive said on Friday. Ciara Lee reports.
